package.name: BigSurCenter控制中心美化-Rootless
package.shortDescription: BigSurCenter replaces the default iOS control center with a new lightweight and elegant one inspired by the control center in MacOS Big Sur. Cracked by CBZ控制中心美化，非常的好看，已汉化，国内全能玩机源免费首发，感谢CBZ大神！大家先尝尝鲜吧！本插件一直没更新，但是能用，凑合着用吧，好像有点卡顿！
